description:
It`s been a long road, but the grand finale of the BanG Dream! Girls Band Challenge finally takes place on the Budokan stage. Which band will emerge victorious?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Kore ga...... Kore Koso ga, Dai Girls` Band Jidai ya!
This... This Right Here Is the Girl Band Generation!
これが...... これこそが, 大ガールズバンド時代や!
